title: Self-Taught Designer (2023 – Early 2024)
description: Started my journey by mastering design software and studying visual principles. Focused on recreating high-end brand aesthetics to understand the balance between typography, color, and layout.

title: Concept Specialist (Mid 2024 – 2025)
description: Moved into creating full brand concepts, like "Taqwa Delivery" and "Cosmic Nova." Developed a personal style centered on clean 3D elements and modern, high-contrast marketing materials.

title: Visual & UI Explorer
description: Currently specializing in high-impact product posters and social media ad campaigns. I bridge the gap between digital UI and physical media by designing everything from high-conversion ad posters to professional printing materials.
